name: Eid
massage: May the blessings of Allah be with you and your family forever and always.

name: Eid Adha
message: May the blessings of Allah be with you and your family forever and always.

name: Eid Milad
message: May the blessings of Allah be with you and your family forever and always.

name: Ramadan
massage: As the holy month of Ramadan begins, I pray that Allah blesses you with strength, patience, and wisdom. Ramadan Kareem!
